name: Tiberius
description: a rotund man in monk's robes.

42: . What can I do for thee today?"
"But thou weepest for no reason! None of thy party is dead!"
"I am Tiberius, healer for this town."
"It is my responsibility to care for the sick and injured."
"I attempt to @heal, @cure, or if needed, @resurrect the fallen."
556: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
802: "Fret not, for all of you are well!"
"Wilt thou make an offering of 30 gold?"
Laying hands upon $Y, Tiberius mends the wounds.
"If thou wilt not pay, I cannot heal thee."
1216: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot heal thee."
"Thou art poor, but thy cause is just."
Laying hands upon $Y, Tiberius mends the wounds.
1419: "Is there aught else I can do for thee?"
1467: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
1713: "Fret not, for all of you are well."
1894: "Wilt thou make an offering of 10 gold?"
Laying hands upon $Y, Tiberius removes the poison.
"If thou wilt not pay, I cannot heal thee."
2143: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot heal thee."
"Thou art poor, but thy cause is just."
Laying hands upon $Y, Tiberius removes the poison.
2348: "I see that $Y carries a parted friend."
2395: "Come to my shop when I'm open!"
"Wilt thou make an offering of 400 gold?"
"Then there is naught I can do save grieve with thee."
2574: "Go see a gravedigger. I'll reckon his price'll be lower."
Your party takes up a collection for their fallen comrade.
2974: Tiberius lays hands upon the corpse...
"I see that $Y carries another slain friend."
